articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media at the entrance of the Bytown Pavilion (John G. Diefenbaker Building) as of 11:30 a.m.
